titleStmt.title: Animadversions on the Scotch covenant Wherein all may receive satisfaction as to the illegality of it, and be easily perswaded to the renunciation thereof. By J. L.
titleStmt.author: J. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Brook, at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: With an added caption title on p. 3: Animadversions, &c.
Copy catalogued has type fade in imprint word "Cornhill".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
